betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThis ritual creates refined life essence.

Place four stasis plates on top of the fire runes.

Place two blood tanks above the master ritual stone, leaving a one block gap. Top is input, bottom is output.

You can use blood tanks of any size!

Recipe: 
     ender pearl
     blaze powder
     redstone
     blood infused glowstone dust
     life essence
